chapters.title: Chapter 17: An Arrival
chapters.info: Jurine Najima, p. 222—Woman with pale, too-large eyes. She is the mother of Colar, Eselle, and Jerid, and the widow of Josef. She is not tall, but is still about a hand taller than Moiraine. See also Najima, Colar; Najima, Eselle; Najima, Josef.
